channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why 'Lift And Shift' Is A Risky Option For Data Migration
item.description: While the lift-and-shift approach seems like a quick and cost-effective solution, it creates more problems than it solves.

item.title: Samsung One UI 7 For Galaxy S23: Surprise Early Update For Millions Of Users
item.description: The rollout of Samsung’s One UI 7 update is happening and if you have a Galaxy S23, your turn is coming now, which is much sooner than expected.
